title: Notable ETF Inflow Detected - IYT, NSC, FDX, KSU - Nasdaq.com
text: Looking today at week-over-week shares outstanding changes among the universe of ETFs covered at ETF Channel , one standout is the iShares Transportation Average ETF (Symbol: IYT) where we have detected an approximate $72.9 million dollar inflow -- that's a 16.0% increase week over week in outstanding units (from 2,500,000 to 2,900,000). Among the largest underlying components of IYT, in trading today Norfolk Southern Corp (Symbol: NSC) is up about 2.3%, FedEx Corp (Symbol: FDX) is up about 3.2%, and Kansas City Southern (Symbol: KSU) is higher by about 2.2%. For a complete list of holdings, visit the IYT Holdings page » The chart below shows the one year price performance of IYT, versus its 200 day moving average:
